text: Approach #1: Intra-Operator (Horizontal) » Decompose operators into independent fragments that perform the same function on different subsets of data. The DBMS inserts an exchange operator into the query plan to coalesce results from children operators. £2CMUDB ; ‘ L —— E S S E E E E E E S - ; — —.
